net.lonewolfcode.opensource.springutilities.annotations

Annotation Type CrudRepo


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface CrudRepo
    This annotation tells the crud controller how to behave. This annotation also denotes what repositories that the crud controller reads from

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      @NotNull java.lang.Class entityClass
      This parameter cannot be null and contains the entity class for the JPA repository this tag is on.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowDelete
      This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Delete function should be performed on this repository.
      boolean allowGetAll
      This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Get All function should be performed on this repository.
      boolean allowGetById
      This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Get single object function should be performed on this repository.
      boolean allowPost
      This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Post function should be performed on this repository.
      java.lang.String basePathName
      This parameter sets the base path.

    • Element Detail

      • entityClass

        @NotNull
public abstract @NotNull java.lang.Class entityClass
        This parameter cannot be null and contains the entity class for the JPA repository this tag is on.
        Returns:
        the entity class

      • basePathName

        public abstract java.lang.String basePathName
        This parameter sets the base path. for example, if this was set to "Dog" your endpoint for this part of the API would be localhost:8080/Dog. Please note that if this is left null then the name of the class will be used as the base path.
        Returns:
        a string representing the desired base path
        Default:
        ""

      • allowGetAll

        public abstract boolean allowGetAll
        This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Get All function should be performed on this repository. this defaults to true.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing this permission
        See Also:
        CrudController.doGetAll(String)
        Default:
        true

      • allowPost

        public abstract boolean allowPost
        This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Post function should be performed on this repository. this defaults to true.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing this permission
        See Also:
        CrudController.doPost(String, String)
        Default:
        true

      • allowDelete

        public abstract boolean allowDelete
        This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Delete function should be performed on this repository. this defaults to true.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing this permission
        See Also:
        CrudController.doDeleteById(String, String)
        Default:
        true

      • allowGetById

        public abstract boolean allowGetById
        This parameter tells the CrudController weather or not the Get single object function should be performed on this repository. this defaults to true.
        Returns:
        a boolean representing this permission
        See Also:
        CrudController.doGetById(String, String)
        Default:
        true
